name: Tank maze
description:
This is a game that combines leisure and competition, with a pixelated map and fresh visuals. Players use directional keys to control cool tanks and command tank combat strategies. With a plethora of battle levels, you can have a great time playing! The goal of the game is to control one's own tank to protect the fortress, eliminate all tanks, and collect energy packs to restore health midway. In terms of visuals, sound effects, user experience, and combat rhythm, it is more exciting and realistic. Drive your tank to pass the levels!

Gameplay

You need to manipulate the tank, constantly eliminate the enemy, and achieve victory!
